sentences.sContent: The possibility remains that the two theories may be reconciled.
sentences.sCn: 这两种理论仍是有可能协调的。

synos.tran: 使一致；使和解；调停，调解；使顺从

words.tran: 不矛盾的；可和解的；可调和的

trans.tranCn: 使一致；使和解；调停，调解；使顺从
trans.tranOther: if you reconcile two ideas, situations, or facts, you find a way in which they can both be true or acceptable
